ygData.authorName: Put a smile on your face
ygData.from: Put a smile on your face <douglas@...
ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s quite easy to unsubscribe, frer.  Easier to just accept that people are going to talk about things that are on-topic that you just don t agree with.
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 22 Aug 1999, Joe Camacho wrote:

>
> Why don you all just shut de fok up about this cleric behavior
> bullshit. My mailbox is full of all this crap that doesnt do anyone any
> good.
>

It's quite easy to unsubscribe, frer. Easier to just accept that people
are going to talk about things that are on-topic that you just don't
agree with.

Have a nice day!
--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
